title: Rate fuel consumed: multiple representations part - a

content.description: The rate of fuel consumption, in gallons per minute, recorded during an airplane flight is given by a twice-differentiable and strictly increasing function R of time t. The graph of R and a table of selected values of R(t), for the time interval 0 ≤ t ≤ 90 minutes, are shown above.
content.question: Use data from the table to find an approximation for R'(45). Show the computations that lead to your answer. Indicate units of measure.

frqParts.text: Use data from the table to find an approximation for R'(45). Show the computations that lead to your answer. Indicate units of measure.

topic.text: 2.1: Defining Average and Instantaneous Rates of Change at a Point

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
